passives.name: Paced Strikes
passives.description: Hitting 3 enemies in one swing grants 10% increased attack speed for 6 seconds.

passives.name: Hitting the Sweet Spot
passives.description: Attacks cleave through more enemies.

passives.name: No More Laughin' Now!
passives.description: Increases crit chance by 5%.

skill.name: Morale Boost
skill.description: Markus grants nearby party members a boost of temporary health and staggers nearby enemies.

passives.name: Waste Not, Want Not
passives.description: Ranged headshots recovers 1 ammunition.

passives.name: Poacher's Mark
passives.description: Double effective range for ranged weapons.

passives.name: Call Out Weakness
passives.description: 5% critical strike aura.

passives.name: Deep Pockets
passives.description: Increases ammunition capacity by 50%

skill.name: Hunter's Prowl
skill.description: Markus disappears from sight for 6 seconds and gains increased ranged attack damage. Ammunition is not consumed.

passives.name: Protective Presence
passives.description: 15% damage resistance aura.

passives.name: Taal's Fortitude'
passives.description: Grants one stamina shield.

passives.name: No Guts, No Glory
passives.description: Reduces damage taken by 10%

skill.name: Valiant Charge
skill.description: Markus charges forward, slamming into enemies and knocking them back.

passives.name: Survivalist
passives.description: Specials drop pickups on death that restore 10% of maximum ammunition

passives.name: Loaded for Battle
passives.description: Increased ammo capacity by 50%

passives.name: Fast Hands
passives.description: Increased reload speed by 15%

passives.name: Ingenious Improvisation
passives.description: Using health items, potions, or grenades has a 10% chance not to consume the item.

skill.name: Disengage
skill.description: Bardin deploys a smoke bomb for 10 seconds that makes him invisible. Gains increased ranged attack power.

passives.name: Gromril Armour
passives.description: Completely absorbs one hit every 20 seconds.

passives.name: Dwarf-Forged
passives.description: Reduced damage taken by 30%

passives.name: Doughty
passives.description: Grants a stamina shield.

passives.name: Resilient
passives.description: Decreases stun duration after getting hit by 50%

skill.name: Impenetrable
skill.description: Bardin taunts all nearby man-sized enemies, gains increased defense and can block any attack for the next 10 seconds.

passives.name: Trophy Hunter
passives.description: Hitting an enemy grants a stacking damage buff that increases damage by 10%, stacking 3 times for 2 seconds.

passives.name: Path of Carnage
passives.description: Increases attack speed by 7.5%

skill.name: Leap
skill.description: Bardin leaps forward to stun a target and gains 30% increased attack speed for 10 seconds.

passives.name: Amaranthe
passives.description: Kerillian regenerates 3 health every 10 seconds when below half health..

passives.name: Arrow-storm
passives.description: Increased ammo capacity by 50%

passives.name: Waywatcher's Bow
passives.description: Double effective range for ranged weapons.

passives.name: Asrai Vigil
passives.description: Ranged weapon zoom. Bound to weapon special by default.

skill.name: Trueshot Volley
skill.description: Kerillian shoots a volley of arrows that seek out enemies in her path.

passives.name: The Dance of Seasons
passives.description: Increases dodge distance by 15%.

passives.name: Renewal
passives.description: Aura that increases stamina regeneration by 100%.

passives.name: Ariel's Benison
passives.description: Revive can't be interrupted by damaging attacks.

skill.name: Dash
skill.description: Kerillian dashes forward through enemies. Hitting enemies with this ability causes them to bleed.

passives.name: Murderous Prowess
passives.description: Critical hit backstabs instantly slay man-sized enemies.

passives.name: Assassin's Blade
passives.description: 50% additional damage when attacking enemies from behind.

skill.name: Infiltrate
skill.description: Kerillian becomes undetectable and can pass through enemies. Lasts for 10 seconds, or until she attacks.

passives.name: Witch-Hunt
passives.description: Tagged enemies take 20% additional damage. Does not stack with similar effects.

passives.name: Eternal Guard
passives.description: No light attack block cost from frontal attacks.

passives.name: Killing Shot
passives.description: Critical hit headshots instantly slay man-sized enemies.

passives.name: Absolutely's Addition
passives.description: (not listed in the game) Base critical strike chance increased by 5%.

skill.name: Animosity
skill.description: Victor pushes back nearby enemies, and boosts nearby allies' critial hit chance for 6 seconds.

passives.name: Blessed Shots
passives.description: Guaranteed ranged critical hit every 10 seconds.

passives.name: Ammo Pouches
passives.description: Increases ammo capacity by 50%

passives.name: Quick Release
passives.description: Increases reload speed by 15%

skill.name: Locked and Loaded
skill.description: Victor fires a powerful shot that pierces enemies.

passives.name: Fiery Faith
passives.description: Power increases by 5% for every 25 health missing.

passives.name: Unswerving Strikes
passives.description: Heavy attacks can't be interrupted by damaging attacks.

passives.name: Heart of Iron
passives.description: Resist death on taking lethal damage.

skill.name: Holy Fervor
skill.description: Victor charges forward and gains 25% increased attack speed for 5 seconds.

passives.name: Tranquility
passives.description: After not casting spells for 6 seconds, automatically ventilates Overcharge.

passives.name: Reckless Haste
passives.description: Overcharge increases spell charge speed up to 30%

passives.name: Pyromatic Surge
passives.description: Increased ranged damage by 10%

skill.name: Fire Walk
skill.description: Sienna teleports forward, leaving a blanket of fire in her wake.

passives.name: Critical Mass
passives.description: Increased critical strike chance based on Overcharge level up to 30%

passives.name: Searing Focus
passives.description: Increases ranged damage by 10%

skill.name: The Burning Head
skill.description: Sienna unleashes a fiery projectile that seeks out foes.

passives.name: Blood Magic
passives.description: 50% damage taken transferred to Overcharge.

passives.name: Slave to Aqshy
passives.description: No Overcharge slowdown.

passives.name: Unstable Strength
passives.description: Increased melee power on high Overcharge by up to 60%

skill.name: Living Bomb
skill.description: Sienna explodes, dealing damage to surrounding enemies and clearing her Overcharge.

melee_traits.name: Heroic Intervention
melee_traits.description: Assisting an ally under attack restores 15 temporary health for both players

melee_traits.name: Off Balance
melee_traits.description: Blocking an attack increases the amount of damage the attacker takes by 20% for 3 seconds

melee_traits.name: Opportunist
melee_traits.description: Increases push strength by 50% against an attacking enemy

melee_traits.name: Parry
melee_traits.description: Timed blocks reduce stamina cost by 100%

melee_traits.name: Resourceful Combatant
melee_traits.description: Melee critical strikes reduces the cooldown of your Career Skill by 5%. Triggers once every 4 seconds

melee_traits.name: Swift Slaying
melee_traits.description: Critical melee strikes increase attack speed by 20% for 5 seconds

range_traits.name: Barrage
range_traits.description: Consecutive attacks against the same target boosts attack power by 5% for 5 seconds

range_traits.name: Heat Sink
range_traits.description: Critical hits refund the overcharge cost of the attack

range_traits.name: Hunter
range_traits.description: Critical hits increase attack power by 25% against targets with the same armor class for a short time

range_traits.name: Inspirational Shot
range_traits.description: Headshots restore stamina to nearby allies

range_traits.name: Resourceful Sharpshooter
range_traits.description: Ranged critical hits reduces the cooldown of your Career Skill by 5%. Triggers once every 4 seconds

range_traits.name: Scrounger
range_traits.description: Critical hits restore 5% of maximum ammo. Triggers once per shot

necklace_traits.name: Barkskin
necklace_traits.description: Taking damage reduces the damage you take from subsequent hits by 40% for 2 seconds. Triggers once every 2 seconds

necklace_traits.name: Hand of Shallya
necklace_traits.description: Healing an ally with a medpack also heals you for 50% of your missing health

necklace_traits.name: Healer's Touch
necklace_traits.description: 25% chance to not consume healing item on use

necklace_traits.name: Natural Bond
necklace_traits.description: Passively regenerates 1 health every 5 seconds. Health from healing items is converted into temporary health.

necklace_traits.name: Shallya's Boon
necklace_traits.description: Increases effect of healing on you by 30%

charm_traits.name: Concoction
charm_traits.description: Drinking a potion grants the benefits of all possible potions (effects only last half as long)

charm_traits.name: Decanter
charm_traits.description: Increases the duration of potion effects by 50%

charm_traits.name: Home Brewer
charm_traits.description: Grants base 25% chance to not consume potion when drinking

charm_traits.name: Proxy
charm_traits.description: Consuming a potion spread the effect to the nearest ally

trinket_traits.name: Grenadier
trinket_traits.description: 25% chance to not consume a used bomb

trinket_traits.name: Shrapnel
trinket_traits.description: Grenades cause hit enemies to take 20% increased damage for 10 seconds
